document_data.name: Rasharoo
document_data.mainbody: '''Rasharoo''' was a [[myconid]] leader of a Circle in [[Neverlight Grove]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Rasharoo was the leader of the small [[Circle of Explorers]] in Neverlight Grove, exploring the [[Underdark]] more often than its fellow. When, with the Rage of Demons, [[Zuggtmoy]]'s will twisted most of the Circle, Rasharoo secretly started making plans to escape.
document_data.Personality: Always a loyal follower of Basidia, Rasharoo's knowledge of the outside world permitted it to more clearly notice the signs of madness in [[Phylo]] and its followers. Because of this, it only trusted [[Basidia]].
